summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 1999 HONDA CIVIC. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE STARTED HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE VEHICLE FAILING TO START. THE CONTACT STATED THEY HAD TO WIGGLE THE KEY IN THE IGNITION IN ORDER TO GET THE VEHICLE TO START. IN ADDITION, THE VEHICLE WOULD STALL AT ANY TIME WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD THE IGNITION SWITCH AND THE CYLINDER LOCK FAILED. THE CONTACT LOCATED A RECALL UNDER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 02V120000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM:IGNITION:SWITCH) BUT THE CONTACT WAS ADVISED BY THE MANUFACTURER THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 253,000.
